notes: Phase 1 fully implemented. Vite 5 project scaffolded with Three.js, GSAP, postprocessing deps. Store with full CRUD, localStorage persistence, and filter stubs. EventEmitter, WebGL detection, fallback UI, input form overlay, CSS2D label system, starfield + lighting, crystalline TaskMesh with RoundedBoxGeometry/MeshPhysicalMaterial, grid layout calculator, scene-store event wiring, camera idle drift, and main bootstrap all implemented. 39 Vitest unit tests covering all store operations pass. Production build exits 0.
